name: Forklift Man
description:
You are Forklift Man! He can rapidly grow his limbs at his will. His amazing superpower must be put in good use among various challenges and puzzles.


Now with 100% more hair: http://ludumdare.com/compo/2016/01/01/new-version-of-forklift-man/

Now with Virtual Reality (optimized for Oculus DK2 and SDK 0.8):

http://ludumdare.com/compo/2015/12/22/forklift-man...

Press ESC ingame for all the new controls.



- Legs ability is received further on in the game
- You are much faster with long legs
- When trying to get on a ledge with long ledgs press space to quickly shrink you legs so you can get on
- Growing and shrinking also works with mousewheel
- You can pull yourself towards static collisions with shrinking in the last room

Tips for the first puzzles:
- The boxy things belongs into the boxy slot thingy above the door.
- Try to get across with using all the boxes.
- Find the big box and put it in that tight space then climb on that.


Created as part of the Ludum Dare 34 game jam: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=44878

Alternative download mirror: http://gamejolt.com/games/forklift-man/114576
